about_the_game:
Set down on the surface of planet Nexus prepped and ready to fight with an Adventure Pack!

This discounted bundle will equip you with extra characters and bank bag slots, a big satchel to hold your gear in, a pet and cosmetic weapon set… and MORE!

Contents:
Character Slot Unlock x2
Extra Bank Slot
Fortune Coins - 3 Pack
16 Slot Bag (Trusty Travel Satchel)
Augmented Garr Pet
Fringer Weapon Set
detailed_description:
Set down on the surface of planet Nexus prepped and ready to fight with an Adventure Pack!

This discounted bundle will equip you with extra characters and bank bag slots, a big satchel to hold your gear in, a pet and cosmetic weapon set… and MORE!

Contents:
Character Slot Unlock x2
Extra Bank Slot
Fortune Coins - 3 Pack
16 Slot Bag (Trusty Travel Satchel)
Augmented Garr Pet
Fringer Weapon Set

name: WildStar: Adventure Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP SP3 (32-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Core2 Duo 2.4 GHz, AMD Phenom™ X3 2.3 GHz, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® 8800 GT, ATI® Radeon® HD 4850, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista® (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Quad Core 2.66GHz or better, AMD Phenom™ II X4 3GHz, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460, Radeon® HD 5830, or better
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Set down on the surface of planet Nexus prepped and ready to fight with an Adventure Pack!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support
